name: consent_info
description:
Survey Instruments Demo

This demo shows how Potato can use standard validated survey instruments for prestudy and poststudy phases.

You will complete:

  • Prestudy: TIPI (Ten-Item Personality Inventory) - a brief personality measure
  • Annotation: Rate the sentiment of 5 short texts
  • Poststudy: SWLS (Satisfaction With Life) and PSS (Perceived Stress Scale)

Click 'I agree' to continue.

name: consent_agree
description: I understand this is a demo and agree to proceed.
